file.name: ssh_run.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Generated for EBF-TAS
  version: '0.2'
servers:
- url: https://bfc.timesys.com
components:
  securitySchemes:
    tokenAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: token
security:
- tokenAuth: []
paths:
  /api/v0.2/devices/{DeviceName}/run/ssh/:
    get:
      tags:
      - api
      operationId: api_devices_run_device_run_ssh
      parameters:
      - name: DeviceName
        in: path
        description: A unique value identifying this device.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                device_ip:
                  type: string
                  description: Device IP address
                username:
                  type: string
                  description: SSH username
                command:
                  type: string
                  description: command to run over SSH
                path:
                  type: string
                  description: Device filesystem location to run commad. Default ~
                  default: ~
              required:
                - device_ip
                - username
                - command
      responses:
        200:
          description: ""
          content: 
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: string
                  data:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      data: 
                        type: string
                      return_code:
                        type: string
                  message:
                    type: string
                required:
                  - result

Error: parse: paths: /api/v0.2/devices/{DeviceName}/run/ssh/: get: api_devices_run_device_run_ssh: requestBody: content: application/json: parse schema: parse schema: path: unexpected default "null" value
